def_en: A linkage between two things is a link or connection between them. The linkage of two things is the act of linking or connecting them.

def_cn: （国际关系中，一方同意做某事，以换取对方同意做另一件事的）关联原则
def_en: Linkage is an arrangement where one country agrees to do something only if another country agrees to do something in return.
